Summary: Displaying a characteristic associated with a deleted group

Precondition: Switch the mode to store management (store_url/admin/home)
In the sidebar, expand the 'Catalog' list
Characteristics 'Test', 'Test 1', 'Test 2' are included in the group of characteristics 'Overall dimensions'
The subgroup 'Groups of characteristics' is opened
Steps to Reproduce: Click on the kebab menu next to the group 'Dimensions'
Select the 'Delete' menu in the kebab
Actual Result: When switching to the 'Characteristics' tab, the characteristics 'Test', 'Test 1', 'Test 2' are displayed with binding to the deleted group
Expected Result: When switching to the 'Characteristics' tab, the characteristics 'Test', 'Test 1', 'Test 2' are displayed without binding to the remote group
